content: a fun beanie design that is one of my go tos for gifting and charitable donations as it works up quickly and is easy to make it s also a perfect market stall item the design is unisex in appeal and the basket weave is a cosy and comfortable fabric if you ve not tried basket weave before this is the perfect simple pattern to learn it top with a pom pom for a feminine touch or follow the messy bun/ ponytail instructions for a beanie that is very much on trend pair the beanie with a simple basket weave scarf or basket weave cowl the example beanies in the images have been made with 100% wool the wool i have used is a thickish australian 8 ply this is compatible with some thinner worsted yarns the beanie also makes up fabulously in wool mix fibres and acrylic fibres remember to spam me #unleychillbeanie @thecrochetfix on social media so i can find your lovely finished objects i hope you enjoy making your unley chill beanie
